challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: That thing you call a car against my 911? You're insane.
American muscle vs whatever you're driving. Title for title.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: This ain't right. That thing shouldn't be that fast.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: I've been watching you drift. You're good. But I'm better. Prove me wrong.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Fair's fair. She's yours now. Treat her right.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: Off the record. Off the books. My Porsche against your best.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Worth every penny. I needed a new hobby anyway.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: I'll be seeing that car in my rearview. Permanently.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: You can't outrun what you can't see. Highway. Midnight. Titles on the line.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: And just like that, I'm gone. Along with your ride.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: Nobody races at my docks without paying tribute. Or you can race me for it.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: A deal's a deal. But you owe me a rematch.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: This is what happens when you play in the big leagues, kid.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: Daddy bought me this car but I earned every trophy with it. Think you can take it from me?
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Ugh. Fine. But I'm getting a better one by Friday.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: That's what I thought. Stay in your lane, literally.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: I brought this car from Osaka. It's never lost. You want to be the first to try?
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: You've earned it. Take care of her. She doesn't like cheap gas.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: This is for the crown. My Supra against whatever you think can beat it. Winner takes all.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: The crown passes to you. For now.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: There's only one king in this city.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: Built her from three wrecked Skylines and a prayer. She's ugly but she's fast. Real fast.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Damn. Well, she's your problem now. Watch the third gear, it bites.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: I race once. If you win, the Z is yours. If I win, I take your best and disappear.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: You'll never see me again. Or your car.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: Everything I own glows in the dark. Including the title to this Viper. Want it?
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Take the keys. The underglow kit cost more than the car, by the way.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: Later, loser. I'll wave the neons at you as I pass.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: I've been racing since before you were born. This Hakosuka has never changed hands. Think you're worthy?
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Finally... someone worthy. She's been waiting for the right driver.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: Come back when you've learned to respect the road.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: You lost everything and clawed your way back. I respect that. But respect won't save you tonight.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: You earned this. Every mile of it.
challenges.opponent_dialogue_lose: Some stories don't get happy endings.

challenges.opponent_dialogue_pre: It's a rental but who cares? I'll just buy another one if I lose. Can you say the same?
challenges.opponent_dialogue_win: Whatever, it's just money. Dad'll wire more tomorrow.
